Package com.inmobi.androidsdk

Interface Summary
IMAdInterstitialListener The listener interface for receiving notifications from IMAdInterstitial about the status of the interstitial ad.
IMAdListener The Listener interface for receiving notifications from IMAdView about the ad status.
 

Class Summary
IMAdInterstitial IMAdInterstitial is used to load interstitial ads.
IMAdRequest IMAdRequest is used to provide extra information when getting ads.
IMAdView IMAdView is used to load and render ads.
 

Enum Summary
IMAdInterstitial.AdMode AppGallery mode vs AdNetwork mode
IMAdInterstitial.State The states of the interstitial ad.
IMAdRequest.EducationType The education of the user (for targeting purpose).
IMAdRequest.ErrorCode Enumeration of different error codes that can occur when fetching the ad.
IMAdRequest.EthnicityType The ethnicity of the user (for targeting purpose).
IMAdRequest.GenderType The gender of the user (for targeting purpose).
IMAdRequest.IMIDType The logical ID types that can be set by the publisher.
IMAdView.AnimationType Enumerator for different animation types.
